page.title: 12LEEK SHOWS
page.content: For many men gardening is a favourite hobby.Some grow only flowers,while others concentrate on vegetables or both,but to many,the most important part of their garden is the leek trench,for the North East is well known for its leek shows. The seed saved from the previous year ,is sown in January in heated greenhouses where the seedlings remain protected until June when the danger of frost is over.They are then planted into the specially prepared leek trench where they are cared for and fed,often with secret ingredients, until September when take place the leek shows organized by local public houses and social clubs.The prizes are awarded according to size,{15cm of {white,}quality and volume.Not only are leeks shown,but also flowers,fruit and vegetables.
